GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of the article with the id provided

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of all the comments under the article with that id

POST /api/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to an article with the provided id

articles.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
articles.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article by the votes count when providing a valid id

articles.author: rogersop
articles.body: Bastet walks amongst us, and the cats are taking arms!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment on an article when valid comment_id is provided.

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all the users

GET /api/articles/?sort-by=title.description: Serves a list of all articles in the queried sort-by
